title: The Ash House
subtitle: Time-Shifting Horror Demo

media.alt: The Ash House - Haunted Manor Poster
The Ash House Official Gameplay Teaser

description:
Experience a chilling demo of The Ash House - a first-person psychological horror where time itself is broken. Play as Jude, an investigative journalist trapped in a manor that exists across three timelines. Solve inter-connected puzzles while evading the Ash Mother, an adaptive AI entity that learns from your every move.

This demo includes:
- 30 minutes of gameplay across two timelines
- Introduction to time-shifting mechanics
- Two key puzzles showcasing the game's unique chronology system
- A terrifying encounter with the Ash Mother
shortDescription: Demo: A time-shifting horror where the house remembers and hunts.
shortDescriptionUnderGallery: Try the demo of our upcoming psychological horror game featuring innovative time-manipulation gameplay.
keyFeatures: Environmental storytelling with Indian horror influences
developerNotes: From Snowman Studio: This demo showcases our innovative time-manipulation horror gameplay. The full game will include three timelines and multiple endings.
system_requirements_content:
DEMO REQUIREMENTS:
Minimum:
OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-8350
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280
Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:
OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
Storage: 5 GB SSD space
key_features_tab_content:
Time-shifting mechanics (Past/Present timelines in demo)
Self-learning AI antagonist (Ash Mother)
Environmental storytelling with Indian horror influences
Demo-exclusive puzzle content
Atmospheric sound design

title: Whispers of the Forgotten
subtitle: Narrative Adventure

media.alt: Whispers of the Forgotten - Game Poster
Gameplay scene from Whispers of the Forgotten
Whispers of the Forgotten - Official Trailer

description: Uncover ancient secrets in Whispers of the Forgotten, a narrative-driven adventure game. Explore mystical lands, solve intricate puzzles, and make choices that shape your destiny. The echoes of the past await your discovery.
shortDescription: A narrative adventure into mystical lands and ancient secrets.
shortDescriptionUnderGallery: Embark on a journey where your choices carve the path through a forgotten world.
keyFeatures: Deep, branching narrative with multiple endings.
Challenging puzzles integrated into the story.
developerNotes: Our second title aims to deliver a compelling story with meaningful player agency. Inspired by classic adventure games with a modern touch.

items.text: Whispers of the Forgotten - Full Game

system_requirements_content:
Minimum:
OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) / macOS Catalina / Ubuntu 20.04
Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X
Storage: 15 GB available space

Recommended:
OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit) / macOS Monterey / Ubuntu 22.04
Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570
Storage: 15 GB SSD space
key_features_tab_content:
Deep, branching narrative with multiple endings.
Hand-crafted, beautiful environments to explore.
Challenging puzzles integrated into the story.
Rich lore and world-building.
Full voice acting.
